Body:
Description: Hallo Support,

We have noticed that some clients generate logs in the console that are in the future.
e. g. LPTP2063620 (Date/Time (Client): 2055-02-27 07:20:21)
The previous events seem to match and the new ones too, but there is an outlier.
Unfortunately, multiple clients are affected.

Please check and fix it.

Regards

Anatoli
What We've Learned Updated: - Logs cannot be collected as the issue is not reproducible

What We've Learned Updated: - Logs cannot be collected as the issue is not reproducible

15 April

The customer checked the System events on the affected computers and found that these were changing the time locally. Further analysis to be conducted on their side. Client closed the ticket.
Next Steps Updated: 14 April - BMW to check the event viewer for any anomalies regarding date time change
